content: What are the plans regarding SMART on FHIR supporting STU3? Perhaps Josh mentioned it in Amsterdam last week, but then I missed it..
we plan to publish smart on FHIR as an appendix to the FHIR specification
will SMART on FHIR be part of the normative content?
we haven't talked about it's path to normative but it would need to be normative eventually
If the question is also related to whether we'll have an STU-3 capable server and installer; yes, working on it.
what parts of SMART are you bringing into FHIR?
